sentences.en: A bistable storage device which stores binary data as states of flip - flop elements.
sentences.cn: 一种以触发器的状态存储二进制数据的双稳态存储器.

sentences.en: Despite all the publicity, her latest novel was a complete flop.
sentences.cn: 她的最新小说尽管广为宣传, 结果还是彻底失败.

sentences.en: He fell with a flop into the water.
He flopped down onto the bed.
He seemed so sure of his decision, how could he flip-flop so dramatically now?
sentences.cn: 他当时好像对自己的决定非常肯定，现在怎么会突然有如此巨大的转变呢？
他脑袋向后仰着，一副可怜相。

sentences.en: I'm a bit of the lmelda Marcos of the flip - flop world.
sentences.cn: 夹趾拖鞋在某种意义上对我来说意味着整个世界.

sentences.en: It is the public who decide if a film is a smash or a flop.
sentences.cn: 影片成败与否取决于公众。

sentences.en: It is the public who decide whether a film is a hit or a flop.
sentences.cn: 决定一部电影会走红还是惨败的是大众。

sentences.en: The boy tumbled flop into the mud.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩扑通地跌进泥里.

sentences.en: The control of a specific flip - flop which stores the algebraic sign of numbers.
sentences.cn: 对存储数字的代数符号的特殊触发器的控制.

sentences.en: The fish gave a flop and landed back in the water.
sentences.cn: 鱼扑通一声又跳回水里.

sentences.en: The game made a big splash all right , like a belly flop.
sentences.cn: 该游戏的确激起了巨大水花, 可惜跳砸了.

sentences.en: The marketing campaign was a flop. The product didn't sell.
sentences.cn: 市场宣传彻底失败,产品卖不出去.

sentences.en: The most commonly used trigger flip - flop is the master - slave type with cross feedback.
sentences.cn: 最常用的触发器是交叉反馈的主从触发器.

sentences.en: There was clearly nothing to do but flop down on the shabby little couch and howl.
sentences.cn: 除了扑倒在那破旧的小睡椅上哭嚎之外,显然别无他途.

phrases.tran_cn: 背越式跳高；福斯贝利式跳高

trans.tran_en: a film, play, product etc that is not successful

trans.tran_cn: 笨拙地抛下；扑通放下；拍（翅）
trans.tran_en: to hang or fall loosely, in an uncontrolled way

trans.tran_cn: （指书、戏剧等）彻底失败，（因疲惫而）猛然坐下，（笨拙地、不由自主地或松弛地）移动或落下，砸锅
